transcript:
Hello?
Hello?
Hello madam. Good evening sir. Parvathi call panniruken sir. IndiaMART account team lirunthu.
Hello madam. Naan already business close ku message anupirukinga. Illa athu thaan athu thaan antha amount refund ketrukeenga la. So athu ellame process ayidichu. Aana unga account details neenga ethume add pannala. So athanala amount unga account la ennala credit panna mudiyala. Account details mattum konjam share panreengala sir?
Athu thaan avanga vanthu mail vanthu check book ketrundaanga. Athan naan mail la potruken.
Illa ippo enakku neenga whatsapp la share panreengala. Naan process pannannum. Yaarume enakku athu solla ve illa. Sonna thaan naan anuppuven. Naanum kettukittu irunthaen. Details yaarume enakku solla. Naan ippo number tharen sir. Appadi note pannunga. Appadi line le anuppunga. Naan process pannitren.
Intha numbera vera numbera madam?
Illa vera number sir. Naan whatsapp number solren.
Irunga solren.
Sollunga madam. Sollunga.
Sir sollunga sir. Number sollattuma. 63852
63852 59711. Nammaloda passbook 59711
6385259711. Correct thaan madam?
Okay sir. Ippo enna na passbook oda front page irukkum la.
Aama passbook illa madam. Avanga passbook illa. Cheque book koduthurukkaanga.
Cheque book irukka. Details sollunga. Cheque book irukka. Athu cheque book oda antha cheque leaf irukkum la. Athu ore oru photocopy mattum enakku share panreengala?
Naan anuppuren madam.
Lakshmi Traders name la thaan sir irukkum?
Aama Lakshmi Traders name la thaan irukkum. Athu appadi naan line le irukken. Athu mattum konjam share panreengala?
Naan unga share panra maari enakku kodukka mudiyaathu. Naan antha ore rendu nimishathula ungalukku naan anuppi vachittu naan ungalukku unga antha numberkku vanthuren ippo udane.
Anuppuren madam.
Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested refund but account details missing.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to share account details.

- Executive provided WhatsApp number for sharing details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send the cheque leaf photo.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account details, whatsapp, cheque leaf
